Title: Bridget / Daryl / Ryan & John
Plot: Bridget Kelly is raped, shot three times, and left for dead by an intruder in her home; Daryl is caught in a freak blizzard that threatens to bury him alive in his jeep; and two boys, Ryan and John, survive a plane crash and maintain cell phone contact with a 911 operator as rescuers desperately try to find them.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
